title: Diesel Spreads Hit Near Two-Year Peak After India Cuts Russian Crude Purchases
summary: Recently, Bloomberg reported that five of India's largest oil refiners have made no purchases of Russian crude for December delivery, instead turning to Saudi Arabia, UAE and Iraq for crude with similar properties to Urals. The move comes after Washington sanctioned Rosneft and Lukoil while the EU …

title: The Remarkable Rise of Natural Gas
summary: As oil prices struggle to find a footing in the wake of the latest OPEC moves, natural gas has stepped into a standout role in the global energy mix. This year, the demand and price trends for natural gas underscore both its resilience and its growing importance as an economic driver and transition…

title: Coalition rallies for COP30 ‘road map’ on how to cut oil and gas
summary: Solar and wind compete with oil and gas to meet rising energy demand

title: Oil major Chevron shifts focus to prioritise profits over production
summary: Business plan unveiled at investor day emphasises need to cut costs and lower capital expenditure

title: Oil and gas demand to rise for 25 years without global change of course, says IEA
summary: International energy watchdog sets out new scenario to reflect fading commitment to climate change
